languages.text: "Звездн{rt_mf|ый|ая} Госпо{rt_mf|дин|жа} благород{rt_mf|ен|на} и справедлив{rt_mf||а}. А злые языки — так те завидуют, честь {rt_mf|его|ее} опорочить хотят. Только подтверждают, что я прав! Вот бы хоть одним глазком поближе... больше ничего не прошу!"
languages.translation_comment:
проверка каунтера: если превалирует великодушие
Плешивый простолюдин

traits.locale_text: "Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа} благород{mf|ен|на} и справедлив{mf||а}. А злые языки — так те завидуют, честь {mf|его|ее} опорочить хотят. Только подтверждают, что я прав! Вот бы хоть одним глазком поближе... больше ничего не прошу!"

languages.translation_comment:
проверка каунтера: если превалирует великодушие
Плешивый простолюдин

languages.text: "The Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} is honourable and righteous. Naysayers envy {rt_mf|him|her}, so they want to drag {rt_mf|his|her} name through the mud. All they do is prove me right! I wish I could get a closer look, just for a moment... Just one look, is all I ask!"
languages.original_text: "Звездн{rt_mf|ый|ая} Госпо{rt_mf|дин|жа} благород{rt_mf|ен|на} и справедлив{rt_mf||а}. А злые языки — так те завидуют, честь {rt_mf|его|ее} опорочить хотят. Только подтверждают, что я прав! Вот бы хоть одним глазком поближе... больше ничего не прошу!"

traits.locale_text: "The Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} is honourable and righteous. The evil tongues just want to drag {rt_mf|his|her} name through the mud out of sheer envy. All they do is prove me right! I wish I could get a closer look, just for a moment... I want nothing else!"

"The Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} is honourable and righteous. The evil tongues just want to drag {rt_mf|his|her} name through the mud out of sheer envy. All they do is prove me right! I wish I could get a closer look, just for a moment... I want nothing else!"

"The Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} is honourable and righteous. Those evil tongues just want to drag {rt_mf|his|her} name through the mud out of sheer envy. All they do is prove me right! I wish I could get a closer look, just for a moment... I ask nothing more!"

"The Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} is honourable and righteous. Those evil tongues just want to drag {rt_mf|his|her} name through the mud out of sheer envy. All they do is prove me right! I wish I could get a closer look, just for a moment... I ask nothing more!"

"The Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} is honourable and righteous. Naysayers envy {rt_mf|him|her}, so they want to drag {rt_mf|his|her} name through the mud. All they do is prove me right! I wish I could get a closer look, just for a moment... Just one look, is all I ask!"

"The Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} is honourable and righteous. Naysayers envy {rt_mf|him|her}, so they want to drag {rt_mf|his|her} name through the mud. All they do is prove me right! I wish I could get a closer look, just for a moment... Just one look, is all I ask!"

languages.text: “那位来自上界的大人确实人格高尚、行事公正，所以那群卑劣的家伙才打算诋毁{rt_mf|他|她}的名誉。可他们所做的一切，仅仅证明了我说的才是对的！我真希望能亲眼见到那位大人，哪怕仅仅是瞧上片刻……哪怕是只看一眼也好！”
languages.original_text: "The Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} is honourable and righteous. Naysayers envy {rt_mf|him|her}, so they want to drag {rt_mf|his|her} name through the mud. All they do is prove me right! I wish I could get a closer look, just for a moment... Just one look, is all I ask!"

traits.locale_text: “那位来自上界的大人确实人格高尚、行事公正，所以那群卑劣的家伙才打算诋毁{rt_mf|他|她}的名誉。可他们所做的一切，仅仅证明了我说的才是对的！我真希望能亲眼见到那位大人，哪怕仅仅是瞧上片刻……哪怕是只看一眼也好！”

languages.text: «{rt_mf|El Señor Celestial|La Señora Celestial} es honorable y just{rt_mf|o|a}. Sus detractores le tienen envidia y quieren arrastrar su buen nombre por el barro, ¡pero solo me dan la razón! Me gustaría poder acercarme y ver cómo es... ¡aunque solo fuera una vez!».
languages.original_text: "The Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} is honourable and righteous. Naysayers envy {rt_mf|him|her}, so they want to drag {rt_mf|his|her} name through the mud. All they do is prove me right! I wish I could get a closer look, just for a moment... Just one look, is all I ask!"

traits.locale_text: «{rt_mf|El Señor Celestial|La Señora Celestial} es honorable y just{rt_mf|o|a}. Sus detractores le tienen envidia y quieren arrastrar su buen nombre por el barro, ¡pero solo me dan la razón! Me gustaría poder acercarme y ver cómo es... ¡aunque solo fuera una vez!».

languages.text: "Semavi {rt_mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz} onurlu ve adildir. Onu kötüleyenler, kıskançlıklarından adını lekelemek istiyor. Tek yaptıkları beni haklı çıkarmak! Keşke daha yakından görebilseydim, bir anlığına... Tek istediğim bakabilmek!"
languages.original_text: "The Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} is honourable and righteous. Naysayers envy {rt_mf|him|her}, so they want to drag {rt_mf|his|her} name through the mud. All they do is prove me right! I wish I could get a closer look, just for a moment... Just one look, is all I ask!"

traits.locale_text: "Semavi {rt_mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz} onurlu ve adildir. Onu kötüleyenler, kıskançlıklarından adını lekelemek istiyor. Tek yaptıkları beni haklı çıkarmak! Keşke daha yakından görebilseydim, bir anlığına... Tek istediğim bakabilmek!"

languages.text: 「天の{rt_mf|君|姫}は、尊敬に値する高潔なお方だ。反対派は、{rt_mf|彼|彼女}をうらやんで、{rt_mf|彼|彼女}の名に泥を塗りたいんだ。彼らのやっていることはすべて、その通りだということが分かった！一瞬でもいいから近くでお目にかかりたい…一目でいいから！」
languages.original_text: "The Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} is honourable and righteous. Naysayers envy {rt_mf|him|her}, so they want to drag {rt_mf|his|her} name through the mud. All they do is prove me right! I wish I could get a closer look, just for a moment... Just one look, is all I ask!"

traits.locale_text: 「天の{rt_mf|君|姫}は、尊敬に値する高潔なお方だ。反対派は、{rt_mf|彼|彼女}をうらやんで、{rt_mf|彼|彼女}の名に泥を塗りたいんだ。彼らのやっていることはすべて、その通りだということが分かった！一瞬でもいいから近くでお目にかかりたい…一目でいいから！」

languages.text: « {rt_mf|Le Seigneur|La Seigneure} Céleste est juste et honorable. Par jalousie, ses opposants veulent traîner son nom dans la boue. Mais ils ne font que me donner raison ! J'aimerais tellement pouvoir l'approcher, rien qu'un instant... Un simple coup d'œil, c'est tout ce que je demande ! »
languages.original_text: "The Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} is honourable and righteous. Naysayers envy {rt_mf|him|her}, so they want to drag {rt_mf|his|her} name through the mud. All they do is prove me right! I wish I could get a closer look, just for a moment... Just one look, is all I ask!"

traits.locale_text: « {rt_mf|Le Seigneur|La Seigneure} Céleste est juste et honorable. Par jalousie, ses opposants veulent traîner son nom dans la boue. Mais ils ne font que me donner raison ! J'aimerais tellement pouvoir l'approcher, rien qu'un instant... Un simple coup d'œil, c'est tout ce que je demande ! »

languages.text: "{rt_mf|Der himmlische Herr|Die himmlische Herrin} ist ehrenwert und rechtschaffen. Viele beneiden {rt_mf|ihn|sie}, darum wollen sie {rt_mf|seinen|ihren} Namen durch den Schmutz ziehen. Sie beweisen nur, dass ich recht habe! Ich wünschte, ich könnte genauer hinsehen, nur einen kurzen Augenblick lang ... Nur ein Blick, mehr will ich gar nicht!"
languages.original_text: "The Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} is honourable and righteous. Naysayers envy {rt_mf|him|her}, so they want to drag {rt_mf|his|her} name through the mud. All they do is prove me right! I wish I could get a closer look, just for a moment... Just one look, is all I ask!"

Viele beneiden {rt_mf|ihn|sie}, darum wollen sie {rt_mf|seinen|ihren} Namen durch den Schmutz ziehen. Sie beweisen nur, dass ich recht habe! Ich wünschte, ich könnte genauer hinsehen, nur einen kurzen Augenblick lang ... Nur ein Blick, mehr will ich gar nicht!"
